weap id [weapon]: 232 (Shock)
damage [dmg]: 10
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Shock [shock], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 40A to forge (A5)

The owner of this potent item is always accompanied by heavy rainstorms and thunder. In battle, the staff can project lightning bolts upon enemies and in melee combat the staff strikes enemies with lightning. The staff can also be used to greatly increase the effectiveness of the Corpse Man Construction spell.
